snippet: While the health law hearings revealed justices’ intellectual side, they also showed their humor and confidence in taking on the most urgent issues of the day.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column on Supreme Court arguments over the constitutionality of Pres Obama's health care law asserts that over three days of intense arguments on the future of President Obama’s health care law, the public got a vivid glimpse of an institution at once immensely powerful and intensely human.
lead_paragraph: While the health law hearings revealed justices’ intellectual side, they also showed their humor and confidence in taking on the most urgent issues of the day.

headline.seo: Sidebar — Justices’ Cerebral Combativeness on Display in Health Law Hearings

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
